subject: [junit] eclipse plugin
msgSnippet: Hi, I want to be able to run specific test in class file. From eclipse I can do that. Does anyone know how eclipse do that ? How does it build it to run
messageBody:
Hi,

I want to be able to run specific test in class file.
From eclipse I can do that.

Does anyone know how eclipse do that ? How does it build it to run specific
tests in class ?
How can I do that with my code ?

Thanks
--
